EmailTemplate.name: 30-Day Trial Expire
EmailTemplate.subject: Your VMTurbo Trial Expires Today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{Lead.First Name}},
Your VMTurbo trial expires today. Are you really going to go back to fighting fires? Have you been missing those 3 a.m. alerts? No? Good, we didn’t think so—say “No” to drowning in alerts and dashboards.
Embrace your calling as the driver of game-changing projects at your company. Schedule a 30-minute demo today. Our team of experts will give you a personalized walk through of VMTurbo, showing you just how VMTurbo will drive your environment to perpetual health.
Sign up for a free 30-minute demonstration today! <http://vmturbo.com/product/request-a-demo?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=30_day_love&utm_content=Trial_Expire>
We look forward to hearing from you!
- The VMTurbo Team
